title: West Virginia teachers return to classrooms
text:
West Virginia teachers return to classrooms 1:33pm GMT - 01:40 
Teachers in West Virginia are back on the job after ending a four-day strike on Tuesday that had kept more than 277,000 students out of class, after the state's governor agreed to a 5 percent pay raise. Rough Cut (no reporter narration).
